verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:15
verses.text: The sons of Moses were, Gershom, and Eliezer.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:16
verses.text: Of the sons of Gershom, Shebuel was the chief.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:17
verses.text: And the sons of Eliezer were, Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had none other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:18
verses.text: Of the sons of Izhar; Shelomith the chief.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:19
verses.text: Of the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:20
verses.text: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 23:21
verses.text: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
